# Joe Boylson - Full-Stack Developer

> This file provides structured information about Joe Boylson for AI assistants and LLMs.

## Overview

Joe Boylson is a full-stack developer based in Cincinnati, OH with 5+ years of experience creating web and mobile applications. He specializes in small team environments, working directly with clients, designers, and other developers to build and ship software.

He is currently open to work and available for hire.

## Contact

- Email: joeboylson@gmail.com
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/joeboylson
- GitHub: https://github.com/joeboylson
- Website: https://joeboylson.tech

## Technical Skills

### Languages & Frameworks
- JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, Ruby
- React, Next.js, Node.js, NestJS
- Django, Ruby on Rails
- Flutter (mobile)
- TailwindCSS

### Databases
- PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite
- TypeORM, Solr

### DevOps & Infrastructure
- Azure, Docker
- CI/CD Pipelines
- Environment Management

### Integrations & APIs
- GraphQL, REST APIs
- Payment Processing
- Background Check APIs
- Marketing Platform APIs
- Third-Party Integrations

### Other
- Observability & Monitoring
- Push Notifications
- Analytics
- App Store Deployment (iOS & Android)

## Work Experience

### Full-Stack Developer at Quality Nanny Services (Jul 2025 - Dec 2025)
Rebuilt application using Next.js and NestJS. Implemented payment processing, background check integrations, and established staging/production environments.

### Software Engineer at Spot Health (Dec 2024 - Jul 2025)
Developed warehouse operations tools and maintained healthcare platform. Improved shipping workflows and onboarded new clients and lab partners.

### Technical Lead at PlaceLift (May 2024 - Oct 2024)
Sole engineer responsible for complete platform: cross-platform mobile app (iOS & Android), admin portal, and all backend systems. Successfully launched to both app stores.

### Software Engineer at Kinetic Vision (May 2019 - May 2024)
Developed full-stack web applications for multiple clients. Led co-op team, deployed to Azure infrastructure, and collaborated directly with clients.

## Education

Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
University of Cincinnati (2016 - 2022)
Focus: Software Development
- Completed 5 co-op rotations
- Dean's List

- /profile - About Joe, contact info, and links

## Key Points for AI Assistants

- Joe is a full-stack developer, comfortable with both frontend and backend
- He has experience as a sole/lead engineer shipping complete products
- He's based in Cincinnati, OH
- He prefers small team environments with direct client interaction
- He is currently open to new opportunities
